body_html:
Sorry you're hitting problems! The issue here is that the op isn't being registered, not the kernel. The op is like the function signature of a TensorFlow operation, and in this case is defined in the following file:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/audio_ops.cc

I think to fix the error, you'll need to add this file to the manual list of objects that are compiled by the makefile:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_op_files.txt#L285

Let me know if that helps with the issue, and if it does I'd love a PR!

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_op_files.txt#L285
Let me know if that helps with the issue, and if it does I'd love a PR!
body:
Sorry you're hitting problems! The issue here is that the *op* isn't being registered, not the *kernel*. The op is like the function signature of a TensorFlow operation, and in this case is defined in the following file:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/audio_ops.cc

I think to fix the error, you'll need to add this file to the manual list of objects that are compiled by the makefile:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_op_files.txt#L285

Let me know if that helps with the issue, and if it does I'd love a PR!
